title: Show the summary proportion in a widget — ratewidget
text: data data frame data table containing data summarize, least two numeric columns: one numerator one denominator. Normally, instance crosstalk::SharedData. numerator name column data use numerator. denominator name column data use denominator. multiplier numeric value multiply proportion (default 100, express percentage). digits number decimal places round result (default 0). suffix optional suffix append displayed value (e.g., "%"). width width widget (optional). height height widget (optional). elementId optional element ID widget.
